Package com.mhealthatlas.apps.repository

Interface TaxonomyClassRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TaxonomyClass,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TaxonomyClass,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<TaxonomyClass,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<TaxonomyClass>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<TaxonomyClass,​java.lang.Long>
public interface TaxonomyClassRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TaxonomyClass,​java.lang.Long>
Contains methods to interact with the database.
The query annotations uses the entity classes defined in TaxonomyClass. Standart actions like save and findAllById are automatically generated.
